title: The Truth Behind No.9 Part One: His dark eyes meet hers, the hatred and lust are so obvious. He wants her but he can't have her so he takes drastic measures to make sure she belongs to him.
description: His eyes meet hers from across the room, he follows her every move. She is completely unaware of his evil side but feels the heat and the hatred almost instantly. After leaving the party she heads home only to see someone has followed her, watching her. The loud thud on her door startles her but it's not long before she wakes up in his bed but all isn't as it seems.
author: D.L.  Taylor
